name: SlackApplication
description:
The Slack application enables you to connect your Slack workspace with OpenMetadata. With two of your most important workspaces connected, you will receive notifications from OpenMetadata directly in Slack. Here are a few benefits that the OpenMetadata-Slack integration enables:
- **Resource Sharing**: Seamlessly share important resources and information between your Slack workspace and OpenMetadata.
- **Integrated Conversations**: Facilitate conversations between Slack and OpenMetadata, ensuring smooth and efficient collaboration.

This Slack app leverages your existing Slack workspace to enhance productivity and collaboration, providing seamless integration between communication and metadata management.
features: Connect your slack workspace with OpenMetadata.
